title: Searching for MID and ADC for Ranked 5's
body:
The title pretty much says the gist of it. Couple mates and myself are looking to have a bit of fun in some ranked 5's. Nothing too serious, preferably through some form of voice chat. Curse or whatever.

IGN - TheLivingEnd

If you're interested let me know in game. Thanks :)

replies.body: hey i am a adc looking for a team
yea if its not serious im in. im a mid laner and have already added you. and i have curse
